author: cnbc.com
title: North American Palladium First Quarter 2018 Earnings Release Scheduled for May 3, 2018
text:
TORONTO, April 19, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- North American Palladium Ltd. (“NAP” or the “Company”) (TSX:PDL) (OTC PINK:PALDF) will announce its first quarter 2018 financial results for the three months ended March 31, 2018 on Thursday, May 3, 2018.
The Company invites shareholders to join its webcast and conference call, which will take place on Friday, May 4, 2018 at 8:30 a.m. ET. A recording of the conference call will be available within 24 hours following the call at the Company’s website .
Conference Call and Webcast Details:
Date: Friday, May 4, 2018 Time: 8:30 a.m. ET Dial In: North America: 1-800-319-4610 International: 1-604-638-5340 Webcast: http://services.choruscall.ca/links/nap20180504.html Replay: North America: 1-855-669-9658 Replay Passcode: 2198 Jim Gallagher, Chief Executive Officer, Tim Hill, Chief Financial Officer and David Peck, Vice President, Exploration will present the Company's operating and financial results followed by a question and answer session.
About North American Palladium
North American Palladium Ltd. (TSX:PDL) (OTC PINK:PALDF) is a Canadian company with over 25 years of production at Lac des Iles mine, located northwest of Thunder Bay, Ontario. North American Palladium is the only pure play palladium producer in the world. With over 600 employees, Lac des Iles mine features a unique world class ore body, modern infrastructure, including both an underground mine and an open pit mine, and a world class exploration portfolio.
SOURCE: North American Palladium Ltd.
